Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Relying less on tutorials, most questions you have can be answered by AI. Unless you have a specific question related to for example, what to include in an exam answer, in which case the teacher is more useful.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: No, both forms of feedback were similar.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Sometimes the feedback can be incorrect from AI, whereas the teacher will usually give very accurate feedback that pertains directly to your studies.
